channel.title: None of my 508 clients work
channel.description:
Ok, so, no matter what 508 client I download, they don't work. I get to Connecting to update server, and then it gets an error in the cmd prompt. This is what it says: [IMG]http://i241.photobucket.com/albums/ff314/soccer_shooter_04/error-1.jpg[/img]
Idk what to do, can someone please help me?
More info: I downloaded the titan cache thingy with Firefox, but, it doesn't have a run option for when you download, so I had to save it as a binary file, then run it, but when I do that, it stops responding, then out of nowhere finishes its installment, and doesnt do anything after that, I can get to the end and exit it, but there is no difference.

item.title: None of my 508 clients work
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Then get an open client

This SHOULD WORK! if it doesn’t then it’s server sided I think. This already has the ip set to 127.0.1:

http://rapidshare.com/files/139551450/508_Client.zip.html

Read full topic

item.title: None of my 508 clients work
item.dc:creator: @z_diddy_reloaded z_diddy_reloaded@hotmail.
item.description:
@z_diddy_reloaded wrote:

I am not a retard… Jesus Christ… I know what to do… Im not a first time coder or first time server hoster…
I’m doing everything right that you would normally do for any other server…

And darn =\ Add my msn: z_diddy_reloaded@hotmail.com
Try and talk from there because moparscape is becoming really laggy and yeah, maybe we can get more figured out from there…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2008, 12:14:32 pm[/size][hr][quote=“King Lingerz, post:12, topic:251361”]You need to run the server before the client otherwise it has nothing to connect to.

Set the IP it is trying to connect to to 127.0.1, then compile. If that doesn’t work then I don’t know.[/quote]
I can’t… It’s not an open client… All class files =(

Read full topic

item.title: None of my 508 clients work
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“z_diddy_reloaded@hotmail., post:11, topic:251361”][quote author=masta XY link=topic=331767.msg2589683#msg2589683 date=1229709836]

The server is online… And I used my no-ip ip AND 127.0.0.1

127.0.0.1 should connect you… did u dl the cache and do what your suppose to?
[/quote]

Did you read the first post like YOU were supposed to?
Sorry, getting a little angry.
I believe so, I just also tried downloading it with IE and selecting run, did absolutely no difference.[/quote]
well damn then, i really have no idea.

Read full topic

item.title: None of my 508 clients work
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

You need to run the server before the client otherwise it has nothing to connect to.

Set the IP it is trying to connect to to 127.0.1, then compile. If that doesn’t work then I don’t know.

Read full topic
